attributes.action: Reduce the number of MPs and councillors claimed to be needed to run this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this country has far to many MPs and councilors, the wage bill alone for MPs exceed 200 million pounds a year, their so called exspenses run into a further excess of 150 million pounds a year. It is believed by us that only 1 MP is required per county thus reducing the burden on public money.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
